TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ReaderWriterLock extends System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.CriticalFinalizerObject
Public NotInheritable Class ReaderWriterLock Inherits CriticalFinalizerObject

summary.span: 定義鎖定，它支援單一寫入器和多重讀取器。

span.span: Defines a lock that supports single writers and multiple readers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 擁有 和 這兩個 Reader-Writer 鎖定。The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] has two reader-writer locks, and . 建議針對所有新的開發使用 。 is recommended for all new development. 類似於 ，但是它有遞迴以及升級和降級鎖定狀態的簡化規則。 is similar to , but it has simplified rules for recursion and for upgrading and downgrading lock state. 可避免可能發生死結的許多情況。 avoids many cases of potential deadlock. 此外， 的效能明顯優於 。In addition, the performance of is significantly better than . 用來同步處理資源的存取權。 is used to synchronize access to a resource. 在任何時候，它可讓多個執行緒的並行讀取權限，或是單一執行緒的寫入權限。At any given time, it allows either concurrent read access for multiple threads, or write access for a single thread. 資源不常變更的情況下`ReaderWriterLock`提供更佳的輸送量比簡單的一個-一次鎖定，例如。In a situation where a resource is changed infrequently, a `ReaderWriterLock` provides better throughput than a simple one-at-a-time lock, such as . `ReaderWriterLock` 其中大部分的存取是讀取、 寫入是不常執行和短時間內的效果最佳。`ReaderWriterLock` works best where most accesses are reads, while writes are infrequent and of short duration. 多個讀取器的替代與單一寫入器，以便讀取或寫入器不會封鎖長時間。Multiple readers alternate with single writers, so that neither readers nor writers are blocked for long periods. > [!NOTE] > 長期保留讀取鎖定或寫入器鎖定會影響其他執行緒。Holding reader locks or writer locks for long periods will starve other threads. 為了達到最佳效能，請考慮重新建構您的應用程式，將寫入的持續時間降至最低。For best performance, consider restructuring your application to minimize the duration of writes. 鎖定或寫入器鎖定，但不要同時在相同的時間，執行緒可以保留讀取器。A thread can hold a reader lock or a writer lock, but not both at the same time. 而不是為了取得寫入器鎖定釋放讀取器的鎖定，您可以使用和。Instead of releasing a reader lock in order to acquire the writer lock, you can use and . 遞迴的鎖定要求增加鎖定的鎖定計數。Recursive lock requests increase the lock count on a lock. 是個別佇列讀取器和寫入。Readers and writers are queued separately. 當執行緒釋放寫入器鎖定時，那時讀取器佇列中等候的所有執行緒會被授都與讀取器鎖定;當這些讀取器鎖定的所有已發行下, 一個執行緒等候寫入器中排入佇列，如果任何項目，授與寫入器的鎖定，等等。When a thread releases the writer lock, all threads waiting in the reader queue at that instant are granted reader locks; when all of those reader locks have been released, the next thread waiting in the writer queue, if any, is granted the writer lock, and so on. 換句話說，`ReaderWriterLock`交替的讀卡機，集合和一個寫入器。In other words, `ReaderWriterLock` alternates between a collection of readers, and one writer. 雖然寫入器佇列中的執行緒正在等候使用中的讀取器的鎖定釋出，要求新的讀取器鎖定的執行緒會累積讀取器佇列中。While a thread in the writer queue is waiting for active reader locks to be released, threads requesting new reader locks accumulate in the reader queue. 其不授與，即使它們無法分享現有的讀取器鎖定持有者; 中的並行存取這有助於保護對讀取器不會無限期妨礙的寫入器。Their requests are not granted, even though they could share concurrent access with existing reader-lock holders; this helps protect writers against indefinite blockage by readers. 大部分的方法上取得鎖定`ReaderWriterLock`接受逾時值。Most methods for acquiring locks on a `ReaderWriterLock` accept time-out values. 若要避免死結，在您的應用程式中使用逾時。Use time-outs to avoid deadlocks in your application. 比方說，執行緒可能會取得在一個資源上的寫入器鎖定，而接著要求第二個資源的讀取器鎖定在此同時，另一個執行緒可能會取得第二個資源中，寫入器鎖定，並要求讀取器的鎖定在第一天。For example, a thread might acquire the writer lock on one resource and then request a reader lock on a second resource; in the meantime, another thread might acquire the writer lock on the second resource, and request a reader lock on the first. 除非使用逾時，執行緒會鎖死。Unless time-outs are used, the threads deadlock. 如果逾時間隔到期且未被授與鎖定要求，方法將控制權還給呼叫的執行緒擲回。If the time-out interval expires and the lock request has not been granted, the method returns control to the calling thread by throwing an . 執行緒可以攔截此例外狀況，並判斷後續要採取什麼動作。A thread can catch this exception and determine what action to take next. 逾時值被以毫秒為單位。Time-outs are expressed in milliseconds. 如果您使用若要指定在逾時，所使用的值是所表示之整數毫秒總數。If you use a to specify the time-out, the value used is the total number of whole milliseconds represented by the . 下表顯示有效的逾時值以毫秒為單位。The following table shows the valid time-out values in milliseconds. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |-1-1|在執行緒等候，直到取得鎖定，不論它花多少時間。The thread waits until the lock is acquired, regardless of how long it takes. 指定的整數逾時、 常數的方法可用。For methods that specify integer time-outs, the constant can be used.| |00|執行緒不會等候取得鎖定。The thread does not wait to acquire the lock. 如果無法立即取得鎖定，此方法會傳回。If the lock cannot be acquired immediately, the method returns.| |>0>0|要等候的毫秒數。The number of milliseconds to wait.| 除了-1，不允許負值的逾時值。With the exception of -1, negative time-out values are not allowed. 如果您指定-1 以外的負數整數，改為使用零的逾時值。If you specify a negative integer other than -1, a time-out value of zero is used instead. （亦即，方法會傳回而不等待，如果無法立即取得鎖定。）如果您指定表示的負毫秒數目-1，以外就會擲回。(That is, the method returns without waiting, if the lock cannot be acquired immediately.) If you specify a that represents a negative number of milliseconds other than -1, is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用若要保護的共用的資源，整數值，名為`resource`，也就是以獨佔方式所多個執行緒同時讀取和寫入。The following example demonstrates how to use a to protect a shared resource, an integer value named `resource`, that is read concurrently and written exclusively by multiple threads. 請注意，宣告類別層級，因此它會顯示所有執行緒。Note that the is declared at the class level so that it is visible to all threads. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This type is thread safe.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立 類別的新執行個體。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the class. 此程式碼是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]

summary.span: 取得讀取器的鎖定。

span.span: Acquires a reader lock.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AcquireReaderLock(int32 millisecondsTimeout) cil managed

span.span: The time-out in milliseconds.

summary.span: 使用逾時值 取得讀取器的鎖定。

span.span: Acquires a reader lock, using an value for the time-out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不同的執行緒寫入器的鎖定，或至少一個執行緒正在等候寫入器鎖定封鎖。 blocks if a different thread has the writer lock, or if at least one thread is waiting for the writer lock. > [!NOTE] > 如果目前的執行緒已經寫入器鎖定，沒有讀取器會取得鎖定。If the current thread already has the writer lock, no reader lock is acquired. 相反地，寫入器鎖定上的鎖定計數會遞增。Instead, the lock count on the writer lock is incremented. 這可防止在它自己的寫入器鎖定上封鎖執行緒。This prevents a thread from blocking on its own writer lock. 結果正是呼叫相同，以及額外的呼叫釋放寫入器鎖定時是必要的。The result is exactly the same as calling , and an additional call to is required when releasing the writer lock. `AcquireReaderLock` 支援遞迴的讀取器鎖定要求。`AcquireReaderLock` supports recursive reader-lock requests. 也就是說，執行緒可以呼叫 AcquireReaderLock 多次，這在每次增加的鎖定計數。That is, a thread can call AcquireReaderLock multiple times, which increments the lock count each time. 您必須呼叫針對每次呼叫一次`AcquireReaderLock`。You must call once for each time you call `AcquireReaderLock`. 或者，您可以呼叫減少為零立即鎖定計數。Alternatively, you can call to reduce the lock count to zero immediately. 遞迴的鎖定要求是一律立即授與，而不會讓要求的執行緒在讀取器佇列中。Recursive lock requests are always granted immediately, without placing the requesting thread in the reader queue. 遞迴鎖定謹慎使用，以避免長時間封鎖寫入器鎖定要求。Use recursive locks with caution, to avoid blocking writer-lock requests for long periods. 有效的逾時值，請參閱。For valid time-out values, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得和釋放讀取器的鎖定，以及如何處理時的要求逾時擲回的例外狀況。The following code example shows how to acquire and release a reader lock, and how to handle the exception thrown when a request times out. 此程式碼是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#3)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]

exception.span: 在授與鎖定要求前過期。

summary.span: 使用逾時值 取得讀取器的鎖定。

span.span: Acquires a reader lock, using a value for the time-out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不同的執行緒寫入器的鎖定，或至少一個執行緒正在等候寫入器鎖定封鎖。 blocks if a different thread has the writer lock, or if at least one thread is waiting for the writer lock. > [!NOTE] > 如果目前的執行緒已經寫入器鎖定，沒有讀取器會取得鎖定。If the current thread already has the writer lock, no reader lock is acquired. 相反地，寫入器鎖定上的鎖定計數會遞增。Instead, the lock count on the writer lock is incremented. 這可防止在它自己的寫入器鎖定上封鎖執行緒。This prevents a thread from blocking on its own writer lock. 結果正是呼叫相同，以及額外的呼叫釋放寫入器鎖定時是必要的。The result is exactly the same as calling , and an additional call to is required when releasing the writer lock. `AcquireReaderLock` 支援遞迴的讀取器鎖定要求。`AcquireReaderLock` supports recursive reader-lock requests. 也就是說，執行緒可以呼叫 AcquireReaderLock 多次，這在每次增加的鎖定計數。That is, a thread can call AcquireReaderLock multiple times, which increments the lock count each time. 您必須呼叫針對每次呼叫一次`AcquireReaderLock`。You must call once for each time you call `AcquireReaderLock`. 或者，您可以呼叫減少為零立即鎖定計數。Alternatively, you can call to reduce the lock count to zero immediately. 遞迴的鎖定要求是一律立即授與，而不會讓要求的執行緒在讀取器佇列中。Recursive lock requests are always granted immediately, without placing the requesting thread in the reader queue. 遞迴鎖定謹慎使用，以避免長時間封鎖寫入器鎖定要求。Use recursive locks with caution, to avoid blocking writer-lock requests for long periods. 有效的逾時值，請參閱。For valid time-out values, see .

summary.span: 取得寫入器的鎖定。

span.span: Acquires the writer lock.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AcquireWriterLock(int32 millisecondsTimeout) cil managed

span.span: The time-out in milliseconds.

summary.span: 使用逾時值 取得寫入器的鎖定。

span.span: Acquires the writer lock, using an value for the time-out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果另一個執行緒讀取器的鎖定或寫入器鎖定，就會封鎖此方法。This method blocks if another thread has a reader lock or writer lock. 如需寫入器鎖定會與多個並行讀取器鎖定交替出現的方式的說明，請參閱類別。For a description of the way the writer lock alternates with multiple concurrent reader locks, see the class. 已將讀取器鎖定的執行緒可以取得寫入器鎖定在兩種方式之一： 釋放讀取器的鎖定，然後再呼叫，或藉由呼叫。A thread that already has a reader lock can acquire the writer lock in one of two ways: by releasing the reader lock before calling , or by calling . > [!CAUTION] > 如果執行緒呼叫`AcquireWriterLock`仍有讀取器的鎖定，它就會封鎖讀取器鎖定; 如果指定無限逾時，則執行緒會鎖死。If a thread calls `AcquireWriterLock` while it still has a reader lock, it will block on its own reader lock; if an infinite time-out is specified, the thread will deadlock. 若要避免發生這類死結，請使用來判斷目前的執行緒是否已有讀取器的鎖定。To avoid such deadlocks, use to determine whether the current thread already has a reader lock. `AcquireWriterLock` 支援遞迴的寫入器鎖定要求。`AcquireWriterLock` supports recursive writer-lock requests. 也就是說，執行緒可以呼叫`AcquireWriterLock`許多次，其中的鎖定計數遞增每一次。That is, a thread can call `AcquireWriterLock` multiple times, which increments the lock count each time. 您必須呼叫針對每次呼叫一次`AcquireWriterLock`。You must call once for each time you call `AcquireWriterLock`. 或者，您可以呼叫減少為零立即鎖定計數。Alternatively, you can call to reduce the lock count to zero immediately. 遞迴的鎖定要求是一律立即授與，而不會讓寫入器佇列中的要求的執行緒。Recursive lock requests are always granted immediately, without placing the requesting thread in the writer queue. 有效的逾時值，請參閱。For valid time-out values, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得和釋放寫入器鎖定，以及如何處理時的要求逾時擲回的例外狀況。The following code example shows how to acquire and release a writer lock, and how to handle the exception thrown when a request times out. 此程式碼是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果另一個執行緒讀取器的鎖定或寫入器鎖定，就會封鎖此方法。This method blocks if another thread has a reader lock or writer lock. 如需寫入器鎖定會與多個並行讀取器鎖定交替出現的方式的說明，請參閱類別。For a description of the way the writer lock alternates with multiple concurrent reader locks, see the class. 已將讀取器鎖定的執行緒可以取得寫入器鎖定在兩種方式之一： 釋放讀取器的鎖定，然後再呼叫，或藉由呼叫。A thread that already has a reader lock can acquire the writer lock in one of two ways: by releasing the reader lock before calling , or by calling . > [!CAUTION] > 如果執行緒呼叫`AcquireWriterLock`仍有讀取器的鎖定，它就會封鎖讀取器鎖定; 如果指定無限逾時，則執行緒會鎖死。If a thread calls `AcquireWriterLock` while it still has a reader lock, it will block on its own reader lock; if an infinite time-out is specified, the thread will deadlock. 若要避免發生這類死結，請使用來判斷目前的執行緒是否已有讀取器的鎖定。To avoid such deadlocks, use to determine whether the current thread already has a reader lock. `AcquireWriterLock` 支援遞迴的寫入器鎖定要求。`AcquireWriterLock` supports recursive writer-lock requests. 也就是說，執行緒可以呼叫`AcquireWriterLock`許多次，其中的鎖定計數遞增每一次。That is, a thread can call `AcquireWriterLock` multiple times, which increments the lock count each time. 您必須呼叫針對每次呼叫一次`AcquireWriterLock`。You must call once for each time you call `AcquireWriterLock`. 或者，您可以呼叫減少為零立即鎖定計數。Alternatively, you can call to reduce the lock count to zero immediately. 遞迴的鎖定要求是一律立即授與，而不會讓寫入器佇列中的要求的執行緒。Recursive lock requests are always granted immediately, without placing the requesting thread in the writer queue. 有效的逾時值，請參閱。For valid time-out values, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool AnyWritersSince(int32 seqNum) cil managed
Public Function AnyWritersSince (seqNum As Integer) As Boolean

span.span: The sequence number.

summary.span: 指示取得序號之後有無將寫入器鎖定授與至任何執行緒。

span.span: Indicates whether the writer lock has been granted to any thread since the sequence number was obtained.

returns.span: 如果取得序號之後有將寫入器鎖定授與至任何執行緒，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the writer lock has been granted to any thread since the sequence number was obtained; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用和`AnyWritersSince`改善應用程式效能。You can use and `AnyWritersSince` to improve application performance. 例如，執行緒可能會快取的讀取器鎖定時取得的資訊。For example, a thread might cache the information it obtains while holding a reader lock. 釋出，並稍後重新取得鎖定之後, 可以使用執行緒`AnyWritersSince`來判斷是否其他執行緒就會有寫入資源中，在此過渡期間，如果沒有，可以使用快取的資訊。After releasing and later reacquiring the lock, the thread can use `AnyWritersSince` to determine whether other threads have written to the resource in the interim; if not, the cached information can be used. 這個技術非常有用是昂貴; 讀取鎖定所保護的資訊例如，執行資料庫查詢。This technique is useful where reading the information protected by the lock is expensive; for example, running a database query. 呼叫端必須將讀取器鎖定或寫入器鎖定保留順序的序號，才能發揮作用。The caller must be holding a reader lock or a writer lock in order for the sequence number to be useful. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法和屬性來判斷另一個執行緒是否會取得受保護資源的寫入器鎖定，因為目前的執行緒上一次保留的寫入器鎖定。The following code example shows how to use the method and the property to determine whether another thread acquired the writer lock on the protected resource since the current thread last held the writer lock. 此程式碼是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#6)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DowngradeFromWriterLock(valuetype System.Threading.LockCookie& lockCookie) cil managed
Public Sub DowngradeFromWriterLock (ByRef lockCookie As LockCookie)

span.span: A returned by .

summary.span: 將執行緒的鎖定狀態還原到呼叫 之前的狀態。

span.span: Restores the lock status of the thread to what it was before was called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 釋放寫入器鎖定，不會考慮遞迴鎖定計數，並還原已由執行緒持有才能升級至寫入器鎖定的讀取器鎖定。 releases the writer lock, regardless of the recursive lock count, and restores the reader lock that was held by the thread before upgrading to the writer lock. 讀取器鎖定上的鎖定計數就會還原。The lock count on the reader lock is restored. > [!NOTE] > `DowngradeFromWriterLock` 接受藉由呼叫取得。`DowngradeFromWriterLock` accepts a obtained by calling . 請勿使用`LockCookie`所傳回。Do not use a `LockCookie` returned by . 執行緒不會封鎖寫入器的鎖定，從降級時，即使其他執行緒正在等候寫入器的鎖定，因為當使用者放開寫入器鎖定授與讀取器鎖定的所有要求。A thread does not block when downgrading from the writer lock, even if other threads are waiting for the writer lock, because all reader-lock requests are granted when the writer lock is released. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何要求讀取器的鎖定，將讀取器鎖定升級至寫入器鎖定，再降級為讀取器的鎖定。The following code example shows how to request a reader lock, upgrade the reader lock to a writer lock, and downgrade to a reader lock again. 此程式碼是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]

span.span: if the current thread holds the writer lock; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範當嘗試取得已寫入器鎖定的執行緒上的讀取器鎖定`ReaderWriterLock`不會授與讀取器鎖定，但改為遞增 寫入器鎖定上的鎖定計數。The following code example demonstrates that when an attempt is made to acquire a reader lock on a thread that has a writer lock, `ReaderWriterLock` does not grant the reader lock but instead increments the lock count on the writer lock. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock.IsWriterLockHeld#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock.IsWriterLockHeld/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock.IsWriterLockHeld#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock.IsWriterLockHeld/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock.IsWriterLockHeld#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock.IsWriterLockHeld/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Threading.LockCookie ReleaseLock() cil managed

summary.span: 無論執行緒取得鎖定的次數為多少，都會釋放鎖定。

span.span: Releases the lock, regardless of the number of times the thread acquired the lock.
A value representing the released lock.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 釋放的讀取器鎖定或寫入器鎖定，不會考慮遞迴鎖定計數。 releases the reader lock or writer lock, regardless of the recursive lock count. 若要還原狀態的鎖定，其中包括鎖定計數，傳遞至。To restore the state of the lock, including the lock count, pass the to . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用執行緒，以及如何還原之後的鎖定狀態已收購方法，以釋出鎖定，不論它多少次。The following code example shows how to use the method to release the lock, regardless of how many times it has been acquired by the thread, and how to restore the state of the lock later. 此程式碼是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#6)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ReleaseReaderLock() cil managed

summary.span: 減量鎖定計數。

span.span: Decrements the lock count.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 減量鎖定計數。 decrements the lock count. 當計數到達零時，會釋放鎖定。When the count reaches zero, the lock is released. > [!NOTE] > 如果執行緒必須寫入器鎖定，則呼叫`ReleaseReaderLock`具有相同的效果，與呼叫。If a thread has the writer lock, calling `ReleaseReaderLock` has the same effect as calling . 如果執行緒不有任何鎖定，則呼叫`ReleaseReaderLock`會擲回。If a thread has no locks, calling `ReleaseReaderLock` throws an . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得和釋放讀取器的鎖定，以及如何處理時的要求逾時擲回的例外狀況。The following code example shows how to acquire and release a reader lock, and how to handle the exception thrown when a request times out. 此程式碼是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#3)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ReleaseWriterLock() cil managed

summary.span: 減量寫入器鎖定上的鎖定計數。

span.span: Decrements the lock count on the writer lock.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 減量寫入器的鎖定計數。 decrements the writer lock count. 當計數到達零時，會釋放寫入器鎖定。When the count reaches zero, the writer lock is released. > [!NOTE] > 如果執行緒必須讀取器的鎖定或不需要鎖定，則呼叫`ReleaseWriterLock`會擲回。If a thread has a reader lock, or no locks, calling `ReleaseWriterLock` throws an . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得和釋放寫入器鎖定，以及如何處理時的要求逾時擲回的例外狀況。The following code example shows how to acquire and release a writer lock, and how to handle the exception thrown when a request times out. 此程式碼是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]

span.span: The thread does not have the writer lock.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RestoreLock(valuetype System.Threading.LockCookie& lockCookie) cil managed
Public Sub RestoreLock (ByRef lockCookie As LockCookie)

span.span: A returned by .

summary.span: 將執行緒的鎖定狀態還原到呼叫 之前的狀態。

span.span: Restores the lock status of the thread to what it was before calling .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 狀態還原`RestoreLock`包含遞迴鎖定計數。The state restored by `RestoreLock` includes the recursive lock count. 如果它嘗試還原另一個執行緒取得寫入器鎖定之後，或如果它嘗試還原另一個執行緒已取得讀取器的鎖定或寫入器鎖定之後的寫入器鎖定的讀取器鎖定的執行緒封鎖。A thread blocks if it tries to restore a reader lock after another thread has acquired the writer lock, or if it tries to restore the writer lock after another thread has acquired a reader lock or writer lock. 因為`RestoreLock`不接受逾時，您應該謹慎地避免可能的死結。Because `RestoreLock` does not accept a time-out, you should take care to avoid possible deadlocks. > [!CAUTION] > 然後再呼叫`RestoreLock`，請確定您已發行的呼叫之後取得的所有鎖定。Before calling `RestoreLock`, make sure you have released all locks acquired since the call to . 例如，執行緒死結 （deadlock) 若已取得讀取器鎖定，然後再嘗試還原較早的寫入器鎖定。For example, a thread deadlocks if it acquires a reader lock, and then attempts to restore an earlier writer lock. 使用和來偵測這類其他鎖定。Use and to detect such additional locks. 請勿使用傳回。Do not use a returned from . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用執行緒，以及如何還原之後的鎖定狀態已收購方法，以釋出鎖定，不論它多少次。The following code example shows how to use the method to release the lock, regardless of how many times it has been acquired by the thread, and how to restore the state of the lock later. 此程式碼是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#6)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Threading.LockCookie UpgradeToWriterLock(int32 millisecondsTimeout) cil managed
Public Function UpgradeToWriterLock (millisecondsTimeout As Integer) As LockCookie

span.span: The time-out in milliseconds.

summary.span: 使用逾時值 ，將讀取器鎖定升級至寫入器鎖定。

span.span: Upgrades a reader lock to the writer lock, using an value for the time-out.
A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當執行緒呼叫`UpgradeToWriterLock`發行讀取器鎖定時，不會考慮鎖定計數，和，執行緒就會將寫入器鎖定的佇列的結尾。When a thread calls `UpgradeToWriterLock` the reader lock is released, regardless of the lock count, and the thread goes to the end of the queue for the writer lock. 因此，其他執行緒可能會寫入要求的升級會授與寫入器鎖定的執行緒之前的資源。Thus, other threads might write to the resource before the thread that requested the upgrade is granted the writer lock. > [!IMPORTANT] > 逾時例外狀況不會擲回呼叫執行緒直到方法可以重新取得讀取鎖定。The time-out exception is not thrown until the thread that called the method can reacquire the reader lock. 如果沒有其他執行緒等候寫入器鎖定，這會立即發生。If there are no other threads waiting for the writer lock, this happens immediately. 不過，如果另一個執行緒已排入佇列的寫入器鎖定時，執行緒的呼叫方法不能重新取得讀取鎖定，直到所有目前的讀取器已釋放其鎖定，以及一個執行緒已經取得及釋放寫入器鎖定。However, if another thread is queued for the writer lock, the thread that called the method cannot reacquire the reader lock until all current readers have released their locks, and one thread has acquired and released the writer lock. 這是 true，即使要求寫入器鎖定的執行緒在目前的執行緒呼叫之後要求方法。This is true even if the other thread that requested the writer lock requested it after the current thread called the method. 若要還原的鎖定狀態，請呼叫使用所傳回`UpgradeToWriterLock`。To restore the lock state, call using the returned by `UpgradeToWriterLock`. 請勿使用此`LockCookie`與。Do not use this `LockCookie` with . 當執行緒必須沒有讀取器的鎖定時，請勿使用`UpgradeToWriterLock`。When a thread has no reader lock, do not use `UpgradeToWriterLock`. 請改用 。Use instead. 有效的逾時值，請參閱。For valid time-out values, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何要求讀取器的鎖定，將讀取器鎖定升級至寫入器鎖定，再降級為讀取器的鎖定。The following code example shows how to request a reader lock, upgrade the reader lock to a writer lock, and downgrade to a reader lock again. 此程式碼是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]

exception.span: 在授與鎖定要求前過期。

span.span: expires before the lock request is granted.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Threading.LockCookie UpgradeToWriterLock(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout) cil managed
Public Function UpgradeToWriterLock (timeout As TimeSpan) As LockCookie

span.span: The specifying the time-out period.

summary.span: 使用逾時值 ，將讀取器鎖定升級至寫入器鎖定。

span.span: Upgrades a reader lock to the writer lock, using a value for the time-out.
A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當執行緒呼叫`UpgradeToWriterLock`發行讀取器鎖定時，不會考慮鎖定計數，和，執行緒就會將寫入器鎖定的佇列的結尾。When a thread calls `UpgradeToWriterLock` the reader lock is released, regardless of the lock count, and the thread goes to the end of the queue for the writer lock. 因此，其他執行緒可能會寫入要求的升級會授與寫入器鎖定的執行緒之前的資源。Thus, other threads might write to the resource before the thread that requested the upgrade is granted the writer lock. > [!IMPORTANT] > 逾時例外狀況不會擲回呼叫執行緒直到方法可以重新取得讀取鎖定。The time-out exception is not thrown until the thread that called the method can reacquire the reader lock. 如果沒有其他執行緒等候寫入器鎖定，這會立即發生。If there are no other threads waiting for the writer lock, this happens immediately. 不過，如果另一個執行緒已排入佇列的寫入器鎖定時，執行緒的呼叫方法不能重新取得讀取鎖定，直到所有目前的讀取器已釋放其鎖定，以及一個執行緒已經取得及釋放寫入器鎖定。However, if another thread is queued for the writer lock, the thread that called the method cannot reacquire the reader lock until all current readers have released their locks, and one thread has acquired and released the writer lock. 這是 true，即使要求寫入器鎖定的執行緒在目前的執行緒呼叫之後要求方法。This is true even if the other thread that requested the writer lock requested it after the current thread called the method. 若要還原的鎖定狀態，請呼叫使用所傳回`UpgradeToWriterLock`。To restore the lock state, call using the returned by `UpgradeToWriterLock`. 請勿使用此`LockCookie`與。Do not use this `LockCookie` with . 當執行緒必須沒有讀取器的鎖定時，請勿使用`UpgradeToWriterLock`。When a thread has no reader lock, do not use `UpgradeToWriterLock`. 請改用 。Use instead. 有效的逾時值，請參閱。For valid time-out values, see .

exception.span: 在授與鎖定要求前過期。

span.span: expires before the lock request is granted.

exception.span: 可以指定 -1 毫秒以外的負值。

span.span: specifies a negative value other than -1 milliseconds.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WriterSeqNum As Integer
public: property int WriterSeqNum { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前的序號。

span.span: Gets the current sequence number.
The current sequence number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 順序號碼會漸次每當執行緒取得寫入器鎖定。The sequence number increases whenever a thread acquires the writer lock. 您可以儲存的序號，並將它傳遞給稍後，如果您想要判斷是否其他執行緒已經取得寫入器鎖定同時。You can save the sequence number and pass it to at a later time, if you want to determine whether other threads have acquired the writer lock in the meantime. 您可以使用`WriterSeqNum`改善應用程式效能。You can use `WriterSeqNum` to improve application performance. 例如，執行緒可能會快取的讀取器鎖定時取得的資訊。For example, a thread might cache the information it obtains while holding a reader lock. 之後釋出和更新版本重新取得鎖定，則執行緒可以決定其他執行緒是否已藉由呼叫寫入至資源`AnyWritersSince`; 如果沒有，可以使用快取的資訊。After releasing and later reacquiring the lock, the thread can determine whether other threads have written to the resource by calling `AnyWritersSince`; if not, the cached information can be used. 高讀取鎖定所保護的資訊時，這個技術非常有用例如，執行資料庫查詢。This technique is useful when reading the information protected by the lock is expensive; for example, running a database query. 呼叫端必須將讀取器鎖定或寫入器鎖定保留順序的序號，才能發揮作用。The caller must be holding a reader lock or a writer lock in order for the sequence number to be useful. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性和方法，以判斷另一個執行緒是否會取得受保護資源的寫入器鎖定，因為目前的執行緒上一次保留的寫入器鎖定。The following code example shows how to use the property and the method to determine whether another thread acquired the writer lock on the protected resource since the current thread last held the writer lock. 此程式碼是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#6)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]
